safeDealLabels.label: Safe deal
safeDealLabels.hint_for_purchase: The purchase can be made as a safe deal
safeDealLabels.validator_fee_is_paid_by_seller: Fee is paid by the seller
safeDealLabels.need_select_pkoin_to_enable_safe_deal: "Safe deal" is disabled. To enable it, add the "{pkoinCategory}" variant in the following section:
safeDealLabels.offer_validator_fee_variant_seller_descr: The seller can cover a full guarantor's fee when using Safe Deal mode
safeDealLabels.offer_validator_fee_variant_in_half_desc: The seller can cover half of a guarantor's fee when using Safe Deal mode
safeDealLabels.faq_answer1:
It is a deal involving an intermediary, who acts as a guarantor of the deal. The buyer pays the deal amount to the guarantor, and after the seller fulfills the agreed conditions, the guarantor transfers the payment to the seller. At the same time, the guarantor withholds a pre-defined commission as a percentage of the deal amount for their service. Payment is made in PKOIN cryptocurrency.

If the conditions of the deal are not met — for example, if the buyer does not receive the goods or services — the guarantor returns the payment to the buyer. In case of a dispute between the seller and the buyer, the guarantor evaluates both sides’ arguments and makes a decision regarding the deal.
safeDealLabels.faq_answer2:
There are three possible options: 
 • Buyer, 
 • Seller, 
 • In half (Buyer and Seller).

The first option will be selected automatically if the seller has not specified in an offer that he is willing to cover the payment. If desired, the seller can specify the second or third payment option when creating an offer. In that case, the option chosen by the seller — being more favorable for the buyer — will be applied automatically.
safeDealLabels.faq_question3: When a safe deal is possible?
safeDealLabels.faq_answer3: A safe deal will be available if a seller has added the "{pkoinCategory}" category to a list of exchange options in an offer and a purchase is made directly from the seller (without involving a pickup point).
safeDealLabels.faq_question4: How does a safe deal work?
safeDealLabels.faq_answer4:
When placing your order, select the "Safe Deal" option. You’ll then be asked to choose a deal guarantor. After that, a chat will open with all participants of the deal, and you’ll see a link to the safe deal page. Next, you will be automatically redirected to the safe deal page. Follow the instructions on that page.

A new link is generated for each purchase. To return to an unfinished deal later, open the chat of the deal and click the link.
safeDealLabels.validation_conditions: Guarantor's fee: {feePercent}% of the deal amount
safeDealLabels.status_2: The buyer transferred the payment to the guarantor
safeDealLabels.status_3a: The guarantor transferred the payment to the seller
safeDealLabels.status_3b: The guarantor returned the payment to the buyer
safeDealLabels.hint_for_update_status: Updating the deal status after payment may take some time (typically up to 10 minutes)
safeDealLabels.user_has_no_access: You do not have access to the deal
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_buyer_step_1: Get confirmation in the chat from the guarantor about their participation in the deal.
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_buyer_step_2: Agree with the seller on the final deal amount.
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_seller_step_1: Agree with the buyer on the final deal amount.
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_seller_step_2: After changing the status, wait for confirmation in the chat from the guarantor that the buyer has made full payment.
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_validator_step_1: Notify in the chat that you are ready to act as the deal guarantor.
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_validator_step_2: Wait for the buyer to transfer the deal amount (including commission) to your account address.
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_validator_step_3: After receiving full payment from the buyer, inform the seller about it.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_buyer_step_1: Wait for confirmation in the chat from the guarantor that the payment has been credited in full to their address.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_buyer_step_2: Wait for confirmation in the chat from the seller that the deal terms have been fulfilled.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_buyer_step_3: Check that the seller has fulfilled the deal terms and inform in the chat whether the terms can be considered fulfilled.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_seller_step_1: Wait for confirmation in the chat from the guarantor that the payment from the buyer has been credited in full to their address.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_seller_step_2: After confirmation from the guarantor, fulfill the deal terms with the buyer and inform about it in the chat.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_validator_step_1: Check that the buyer’s payment has been credited in full to your account address and confirm this in the chat.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_validator_step_2: Wait for the buyer's message in the chat about checking the fulfillment of the deal terms.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_validator_step_3: Make a decision on the deal and either transfer the payment to the seller or return the payment to the buyer.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_validator_info_1: If the buyer considers the deal terms fulfilled, the payment is transferred to the seller, and the guarantor retains their commission.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_validator_info_2: If the seller refuses to fulfill the terms, the payment is returned to the buyer in full.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_validator_info_3: If there is a dispute between the buyer and the seller about the fulfillment of the deal terms, review both parties’ arguments and make the final decision on the deal. The guarantor retains their commission only if the deal terms are fulfilled.
safeDealLabels.status_4a_role_buyer_info_1: The guarantor has confirmed that the deal terms have been fulfilled. The payment has been transferred to the seller.
safeDealLabels.status_4a_role_buyer_info_2: Please rate your purchase and leave feedback.
safeDealLabels.status_4a_role_seller_info_1: Check that the payment from the guarantor (minus the guarantor's fee) has been credited in full to your account address and confirm this in the chat.
safeDealLabels.status_4a_role_validator_info_1: Wait for confirmation in the chat from the seller that the payment has been credited in full to their address (including your commission).
safeDealLabels.status_4b_role_buyer_info_1: The guarantor has determined that the deal terms have not been fulfilled and returned the payment to your account address.
safeDealLabels.status_4b_role_buyer_info_2: Check that the payment has been credited in full and confirm this in the chat.
safeDealLabels.status_4b_role_seller_info_1: The guarantor has determined that the deal terms have not been fulfilled and returned the payment to the buyer.
safeDealLabels.status_4b_role_validator_info_1: Wait for confirmation in the chat from the buyer that the payment has been credited in full to their address.
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_buyer_confirmation: I confirm that I have completed the specified actions and am ready to transfer the payment to the guarantor.
safeDealLabels.status_1_role_buyer_deal_value_field_tex: Enter the final deal amount, PKOIN
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_validator_confirmation: I confirm that I have completed the specified actions and am ready to make a decision on the deal.
safeDealLabels.status_2_role_validator_deal_result_fiel: Have the deal terms been fulfilled?
safeDealLabels.transfer_amount_field_text: The payment amount will be: {payment} PKOIN
safeDealLabels.hint_for_payment_transfer: The payment is made in a single transaction and only here, otherwise it will not be counted! The amount will be debited from the account address.
safeDealLabels.waiting_for_payment_confirmation_step_1: Wait for the transaction to be confirmed on the blockchain. Click the "Update status" button after about 10 minutes.
safeDealLabels.waiting_for_payment_confirmation_info_1: The transaction link has been sent to the chat
safeDealLabels.status_loading_error_full_message: An error occurred while updating the status: {error}. Click the "Update status" button to try again.
